item.title: A new article is out: Role of LCF scale as an outcome prognostic index in patients with traumatic brain injury
item.author: Author
item.description:
Dear all, it is with extreme plaseure that I am announcing a new epidemiological study of Elena Rossato, MD, which I co-authored.

Rossato, E., Verzini, E., Scandola, M., Ferrari, F., & Bonadiman, S. (2021). Role of LCF scale as an outcome prognostic index in patients with traumatic brain injury. Neurological Sciences, 42(7), 2747–2752. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10072-020-04852-1
